description: Home 'N' Us Properties gladly welcomes you to The Bay, where luxury and comfort come together in this elegantly furnished 2 bedroom apartment offering mesmerizing views. This apartment is situated just 1km away from Dubai Mall, one of the world's premier shopping and entertainment destinations.  As you enter, you'll be greeted by a spacious and tastefully designed living area, furnished with sophistication and style. Large windows offer breathtaking views, adding to the allure of the apartment.  Step out onto the attached balcony and soak in the panoramic views of the city. This private outdoor space provides the perfect setting to relax, entertain, and enjoy the stunning surroundings.  The apartment features two bedrooms, each with an attached washroom for added convenience. The bedrooms are elegantly furnished and equipped with built-in wardrobes, providing ample storage space for your belongings and ensuring a clutter-free living environment.  Residents of The Bay are privileged to access a range of amenities. Separate adult and kids swimming pools cater to the needs of all residents, providing a refreshing oasis to cool off and relax. The gym is well-equipped, allowing residents to stay fit and active within the comfort of their own building.  Beyond the apartment and building amenities, The Bay's location places you just 1km away from Dubai Mall. Indulge in a world-class shopping experience, dine at gourmet restaurants, or immerse yourself in entertainment options, including a state-of-the-art cinema.  In summary, this elegantly furnished 2 bedroom apartment in The Bay offers a luxurious living space with mesmerizing views. Enjoy the convenience of an attached balcony, attached washrooms, and built-in wardrobes in both bedrooms. Take advantage of the building amenities, including separate adult and kids swimming pools and a gym. With its prime location near Dubai Mall, you'll have easy access to a multitude of shopping, dining, and entertainment options, ensuring a vibrant and convenient lifestyle.

description: Type A 4 bed large, single row villa - A lovely large 4 bedroom in the brand new, gated development of Murooj.  Murooj is in the heart of Al Furjan by the master developer Nakheel.  This villa is bright, light and spacious with a downstairs ensuite bedroom, a separate Livingroom, a large dinning and entertainment area, open planned kitchen, guest bathroom, laundry and maids room. The large glass staircase leads to a big open plan family area with pantry.  The master bedroom has walk in wardrobes and a large private bathroom with double sink, bath and separate shower.  The additional 2 bedrooms also have build in wardrobes and private bathrooms. All bedrooms have beautiful light wooden flooring throughout.  There are 2 covered balconies offering fantastic views across the community and city.   At the front of the villa there is covered parking for 3 cars, a secure walled and gated garden for maximum privacy and path that leads to the back garden.  This is  a single row with large garden not overlooked by any other villas; a perfect family home This newly handed over community has multiple pools, parks and play areas, including dog parks and running tracks. Call for more information today.  ------- Development Details ------- Al FurjanÂ is a residential property development near Jebel Ali in the United Arab Emirates. Nakheel is the master developer of this project. The Al Furjan development will comprise four specific villages: North, South, East and West, that will share the same streetscape designs, a network of pathways and access to amenities. Each village will have its own distinct characteristics that compliment the other and create a balanced variety of experiences.
